name: ViewMyBrand
overview:
Viewmybrand.com™ (VMB) is a new website concept seeking to capitalize off of the need for direct brand management in the sphere of social media. From the company’s vantage point, far too many Internet start-ups are afforded the comfort of not having to focus on a revenue-based system. VMB has chosen the road less traveled, by focusing the team’s efforts on the details, which have been designed to drive revenue and exponential growth.

By leveraging the critical aspects of social media: responsiveness, vanity, trust, and community, VMB will provide the piece of the puzzle, which the consumer and the brand manager currently miss: a direct portal for brand management and sales in one system.
